item.title: User Manual
item.description:
User Manual

ðŸ“± How to Use the App

  1. Launch the app
  2. Log in using valid credentials
  3. Browse the list of movies
  4. Tap any movie to open details
  5. Go to the profile screen to manage your account
  6. Use the filter sheet to sort or filter results
